supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-20 (in mm), (1) 8 x 67, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 29 x 35, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) traces of 1 line, (3) 40 x 55, (A) 6 lines, left margin (?), (B) blank, (4) 35 x 25, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 40 x 28, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, bottom margin, (6) 14 x 35, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (7) 28 x 17, (A) 1 line, top margin, (B) blank, (8) 28 x 12, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 17 x 14, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 24 x 15, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (11) 30 x 17, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (12) 24 x 24, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 18 x 17, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 86 x 47, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (15) 47 x 20, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (16) 63 x 26, (A) 1 line, right bottom margins, (B) blank, (17) 94 x 29, (A) 6 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (18) 56 x 24, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (19) 58 x 21, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (20), 57 x 24, (A) 4 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
